definition: classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)
drum/CL:通[tong4],面[mian4]/to drum/to strike/to rouse/to bulge/to swell

sentences.english: Theoretical analysis and simulation results show the validity of RGA.
sentences.chinese: 理论分析和仿真实验结果都是令人鼓舞的。

sentences.english: But there are signs of encouragement on the continent.
sentences.chinese: 但是非洲大陆也有令人鼓舞的迹象。

sentences.english: I say that because Saturn will be comfortingly close and helpful.
sentences.chinese: 我这样说是因为土星将有着密切的，有益的令人鼓舞。

sentences.english: Looking at the world through the lense of Google's earnings is encouraging.
sentences.chinese: 透过谷歌业绩这块“透镜”看世界是令人鼓舞的。

sentences.english: Retail sales data will maintain the run of encouraging data with sales boosted by promotions over the holiday season.
sentences.chinese: 受惠于假日促销活动，零售数据将会持续令人鼓舞。

sentences.english: That is encouraging. So is the farming.
sentences.chinese: 这是令人鼓舞的现象，农业也是如此。

sentences.english: Our electrically-powered car is an exciting new development .
sentences.chinese: 我们的电动汽车是一项令人鼓舞的新发明。

sentences.english: This not "Meritorious service" the inside girl is also singing, is inspiring.
sentences.chinese: 这不《功勋》里面的小姑娘也在唱，多么令人鼓舞。

sentences.english: I found it both encouraging and discouraging.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得既令人鼓舞又令人沮丧。

sentences.english: But the news overall is cheerier .
sentences.chinese: 但总体的消息还是令人鼓舞。

sentences.english: It's inspiring to see such a bright and vigorous sight.
sentences.chinese: 看到如此熠熠生辉和充满活力的景象真是令人鼓舞。

sentences.english: Yet the past is not encouraging.
sentences.chinese: 虽然，过去并不令人鼓舞。

sentences.english: The isolated success stories are encouraging, Mr. Oxley said.
sentences.chinese: 奥克斯利说，这些个别的成功例故事令人鼓舞。

sentences.english: The last time I went under the knife was not a particularly ennobling experience.
sentences.chinese: 上次我躺在手术刀下的经历并不特别令人鼓舞。

sentences.english: But there is encouraging news about the recognition of the value of science.
sentences.chinese: 但是也有一些关于认识到科学价值的令人鼓舞的新闻。

definition: to inform/to report/to make known/report/speech/talk/lecture/CL:篇[pian1],份[fen4],個|个[ge4],通[tong4]
